column4: so im trying to get my ath0 located card to show up in the interface list in wireshark. but I dont for the life of me know how to get a listing of the devices names
so im trying to get my ath0 located card to show up in the interface list in wireshark. but I dont for the life of me know how to get a listing of the devices names
what is the command in terminal to get a device's name?
pci is lspci usb is lsusb
